safetyTips: Social distancing, payment by BAC transfer.
name: FORGET-ME-NOT-FLOWERS
address: Wingrove, Flood St. Mersham, Ashford, Kent, TN25 6NX
description: I am a local independent florist who works from Mersham Nr. Ashford .  I specialise in beautiful, bespoke flowers for all occasions, aiming to the personal floral requirements of my clients be it for a wedding, a funeral or other events. I also provide a seasonal basket and pot filling service.  Call to discuss any floral requirements free of charge and be assured of fair prices and knowledgeable advice.  Free deliveries within a five mile radius. Over five miles charged.
